thread.section_title: Mantel Beoordelingen | Beoordelingen van Mantel | www.mantel.com | 9 van 816
thread.title: RichardMcKinney

author: RichardMcKinney
title: RichardMcKinney
text: I had never seen or heard of Mantel until last week when I purchased some tyres. The price and free P&P is always going to be the strongest selling point when you shop online and that is why I bought from them. The delivery and updates by email and text were accurate and the tyres arrived within 3 days. A simple formula for success. From this experience I can say that you can buy with confidence.
